gameDetails.name: Broom Service: The 1st Expansion
gameDetails.description:
This expansion for the board game of Broom Service is contained in Broom Service: The Card Game.

It contains 16 special cards which you shuffle and divide into 2 piles. If you play a role card cowardly, then instead of executing the action, you may take 1 of the visible special cards or activate 1 of your special cards you took on a previous turn.
